alert.note: Alert for Geary; Lyon; Morris; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 12:15AM CDT until June 10 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Geary County in east central Kansas... Morris County in east central Kansas... Southern Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... Northern Lyon County in east central Kansas... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1214 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Volland to 7 miles northeast of Council Grove Lake to 8 miles northwest of Strong City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Council Grove, Eskridge, Alta Vista, Dwight, Harveyville, Allen, Admire, Wilsey, Parkerville, Bushong, Dunlap, Council Grove Lake and Volland. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 136 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
